name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: 1. Boil pasta in salted water until al dente
2. Fry bacon until crispy
3. Mix eggs with parmesan
4. Combine pasta with bacon and egg mixture
5. Season with black pepper and serve

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C
2. Stretch pizza dough on baking sheet
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly
4. Add mozzarella and basil
5. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden

name: Butter Chicken
steps: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour
2. Fry onions and garlic until golden
3. Add ginger and cook for 1 minute
4. Add chicken and cook until brown
5. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes
6. Add cream and butter, cook until thickened

name: Pad Thai
steps: 1. Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes
2. Heat oil in wok and fry garlic
3. Add shrimp and cook until pink
4. Push ingredients aside and scramble eggs
5. Add noodles and sauce, toss to combine
6. Add bean sprouts and peanuts, serve with lime

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
steps: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high
2. Mix olive oil, minced garlic, and dill
3. Brush salmon with oil mixture
4. Season with salt and pepper
5. Grill for 6-8 minutes per side
6. Serve with lemon wedges

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: 1. Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces
2. Heat oil in wok
3. Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
4. Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli)
5. After 3 minutes add peppers
6. Pour soy sauce and toss
7. Garnish with sesame seeds

name: Caesar Salad
steps: 1. Wash and tear romaine lettuce
2. Toss with caesar dressing
3. Add croutons and parmesan
4. Top with anchovies
5. Drizzle with lemon juice and serve

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: 1. Mix chili powder, cumin, and lime juice for marinade
2. Marinate pork for 2 hours
3. Grill pork until cooked through
4. Slice pork thinly
5. Grill pineapple slices
6. Warm tortillas
7. Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for 1 hour
2. Cook chicken in tandoor or oven at 200°C for 15 minutes
3. Sauté onions and garlic until golden
4. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes
5. Add cooked chicken and cream
6. Simmer for 5 minutes and serve with rice or naan

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: 1. Preheat oven to 190°C
2. Cream butter and sugar until fluffy
3. Add eggs and vanilla extract
4. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt
5. Fold in chocolate chips
6. Drop spoonfuls on baking sheet
7. Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown

name: Greek Moussaka
steps: 1. Slice eggplant and fry until golden
2. Brown ground beef with onions and garlic
3. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes
4. Layer eggplant and meat sauce in baking dish
5. Mix cream and parmesan for topping
6. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes until golden

name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
steps: 1. Cook quinoa according to package directions
2. Roast sweet potato at 200°C for 25 minutes
3. Roast chickpeas with spices for 20 minutes
4. Massage kale with lemon juice and olive oil
5. Make tahini dressing with lemon and water
6. Assemble bowl with all ingredients
7. Drizzle with tahini dressing

name: Beef Tacos
steps: 1. Brown ground beef in skillet
2. Season with cumin, chili powder, and garlic
3. Warm taco shells according to package
4. Dice lettuce and tomato
5. Fill shells with beef
6. Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream
7. Serve with salsa

name: Pasta Primavera
steps: 1. Cook pasta until al dente
2. Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces
3. Sauté garlic in olive oil
4. Add vegetables and cook for 5-7 minutes
5. Toss pasta with vegetables
6. Top with fresh basil and parmesan

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
steps: 1. Cook rice according to package directions
2. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
3. Cook vegetables in a pan or steamer
4. In a skillet, cook chicken pieces until golden
5. Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken
6. Assemble bowls with rice, vegetables, and chicken
7. Garnish with sesame seeds

name: Caprese Sandwich
steps: 1. Slice ciabatta bread in half
2. Brush with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
3. Layer tomato slices and mozzarella
4. Add fresh basil leaves
5. Close sandwich and press gently
6. Slice and serve

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: 1. Cook egg noodles according to package directions
2. Slice beef thinly and season with salt and pepper
3. Brown beef in a skillet and set aside
4. In same skillet, sauté onions and mushrooms
5. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute
6. Return beef to pan, add broth and simmer for 10 minutes
7. Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: 1. Sauté curry paste, onions, and garlic in oil
2. Add potatoes and carrots, cook for 5 minutes
3. Pour in tomato and coconut milk
4. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until vegetables are tender
5. Add peas and cook for 3 more minutes
6. Serve with rice or naan

name: Blueberry Pancakes
steps: 1. Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a bowl
2. Whisk eggs and milk together
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed
4. Fold in blueberries
5. Heat butter on griddle
6. Pour batter and cook until bubbles form
7. Flip and cook until golden brown
8. Serve with maple syrup
